goal.en: “First, the teaching objectives: The course through the demonstration and simulation, to enable students to understand the basic physics concepts, as well as connection between everyday life and the physical phenomenon of. For the introduction of physical concepts, will be the image presentation on the laws of physics, try not to use formula. Daily life there are many phenomena can be understood by the very simple laws of physics, but in modern science and technology under the packaging, often make people think that the physical is very complex. Through the course, students will understand many phenomena from the simple fact of physics, but also through the practice of repeated criticism of the exercise, which enjoy the beauty of the place.“
goal.ch: 一、教學目標： 了解物理學認識世界的方式、學習物理探究的流程、提升推理及批判思考能力。

content.en:
1. Introduction, introduces the physical concepts and architecture
2. Our world
3. Motion I (kinematics)
4. Motion II (kinematics)
5. Static I (mechanics)
6. Static II (Mechanics)
7. Cycle I (periodic motion, fluctuation)
8. Cycle II (periodic motion, fluctuation)
9. Thermal science
10. Optical, interim progress report
11. Superstition and Physics
12. Electromagnetic
13. Electromagnetic II
14. Scale Physics
15. Envelope Physics for School (Important for Estimation)
16. Invisible physical phenomena
17. Final Report I
18. Final Report II“
content.ch:
1.課程綜合介紹、分組、物理基本概念介紹
2.期初施測(科學推理、量化推理、批判思考等)
3.費米問題、尺度與系統
4.物理探究是甚麼？
5.科學繪圖、溝通與表達
6.機率、薪資結構與波茲曼分布
7.建模的練習
8.?學的探究與實作主題I
9.?學的探究與實作主題II
10.熱的探究與實作主題I
11.熱的探究與實作主題II
12.電磁的探究與實作主題I
13.電磁的探究與實作主題II
14.光的探究與實作主題I
15.光的探究與實作主題II
16.Gussimation，估算能力的訓練及養成
17.期末評量及科學推理、量化推理、批判思考問卷施測
18.期末總整及回饋
